title: Sturgeon dismisses speculation about her future
content: Scotland's first minister says she intends to remain in the job for the full parliamentary term.

title: Sturgeon dismisses speculation about her future
content: Scotland's first minister says she intends to remain in the job for the full parliamentary term.

title: Johnson hits back at critics at stormy PMQs
content: Labour's Keir Starmer accuses the prime minister of "broken promises" on social care and rail investment.

title: As it happened: PM questioned over 'broken promises'
content: Boris Johnson was quizzed after a Tory rebellion on social care and criticism of a speech to business leaders.

title: PC Andrew Harper's widow wins bid to change law
content: Ministers back Lissie Harper's campaign to jail those who kill on-duty police and 999 workers for life.

title: MP's law on Down's care needs moves step closer
content: A bill proposed by Tory backbencher Liam Fox to guarantee care needs is now expected to become law.

title: No babies allowed in Commons, MP told
content: A review of rules is called after Stella Creasy took her three-month-old into Westminster Hall.

title: Drakeford asks PM for consultation on Covid probe
content: First minister urges Boris Johnson to hold "meaningful public consultation" to set inquiry terms.
